appetizers.name: Edamame Plate
appetizers.description: A scrumptious plate of steamed Edamame beans. Normal, salted, or garlic.

appetizers.name: King's Crab Cake
appetizers.description: Pan-seared, Alaskan King Crab with lemon aioli.

appetizers.name: Shrimp Taco Bites
appetizers.description: A plate of mini tacos served with pico de gallo, ctoija, and guacamole.

soups.name: Clam Chowder
soups.description: A bowl of hearty New England Clam Chowder, served with sourdough bread.

soups.name: Miso Soup
soups.description: A sweet, mellow bowl of umami miso soup.

entrees.name: Shrimp Linguine
entrees.description: A bright and lemony shrimp pasta dish.

entrees.name: Balsamic Salmon
entrees.description: A salmon dish with green beans amandine and balsamic vinaigrette.

entrees.name: Pan Seared Chilean Sea Bass
entrees.description: Fresh bass seared in a hot skillet and topped with a lemon butter sauce.

entrees.name: Catch of the Day
entrees.description: The fresh catch of the day, prepared to the chef's likings.

drinks.name: Bourbon Street
drinks.description: Kentucky straight bourbon, Diplomatico 8yr rum, Benedictine, sweet vermouth and bitters... over block ice.

drinks.name: Mojito Verde
drinks.description: Aged light rum, house made lime syrup, mint, and sugar... swizzled with crushed ice

drinks.name: Mezcalero
drinks.description: silver tequila, Del Maguey 'Vida' Mezcal, lime, passion fruit & pineapple cordials with orange essence... served up.
